author: ungerskpappa
title: Nothing special but couldn' leave it there.
review:
I got this polybag with the april issue of Kalle Anka (Donald Duck in Sweden) for 33SEK that is €5,90.

There was nothing special about the set and I already have a few police helicopters but who would miss a set and a minifigure for this price?

Box/Instructions

Polybag / Easy instructions, 12 steps

Parts

Parts are of the usual good shiny quality, extra leftover parts are: 1 helmet visor (grey), 1 gearstick (white/black), 1 round lamp (yellow), 1 flat lamp (blue)

Minifigures

The police officer/pilot is nice with belt, badge and pocket, the face is a normal smiling face with eyebrows.

The build

It was easy, maybe too easy and quick but what to expect from a polybag, right?

The completed model

Nice little model, however I couldn't help but turn the front light inside out, I think it looks much better.

Overall opinion

Easy build, thanks to the two blue pieces in the rear it's easy to hold when playing.
